name: The Perfect Date
description:
A kid finds a book belonging to his grandfather in the attic of his house and writes the love story of his grandparents in it. Making decisions on the day he’s going to propose.

Made for the NYU Game Lab chapter of Global Game Jam 2022. 

Credits: Camilo Quintero, Fabián Gutiérrez, Gregory Kramer, Janay Maisano, Keanan Pucci
